dialogues.content: Today, I'll go to the library to read for a while, and then I'll head back home.

dialogues.name: ClassmateC
dialogues.content: Hi Vincent, are you also coming to the library to study?

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Yeah, yesterday I couldn't understand a few questions. Let's see if we can find the answers at the library.

dialogues.name: ClassmateC
dialogues.content: You study really hard; no wonder you're doing so well!

dialogues.name: Vincent
dialogues.content: Can't say my grades are good. The academic pressure is just too intense, forcing me to work this hard.
